Question & Options:
In the 2005 movie 'Black', who replaced A. R. Rahman as the composer?
Options:
A. Monty Sharma
B. Rahul Sharma
C. Anu Malik
D. Pritam

In the 2005 movie 'Black', which song is the only one that contains lyrics in its soundtrack?
Options:
A. A. Haan Maine Chukar Dekha Hai
B. B. Tum Hi Ho
C. C. Tujhe Kitna Chahne Lage
D. D. Kabira
Correct Answer: A. Haan Maine Chukar Dekha Hai
